Summary: On two occasions myself and my wife saw the exact same craft fly over our town they were using a clocking system but u could still see them.
trends: There have been 59 other sightings in Tulsa
There were no other sightings in Tulsa on or around July 6th 2006
divs: Sighting Detailsthis one was after our very first sighting we made it our hobby to lay on our trampoline at night for hours too see if we could see anything again on this paticular day we took a walk around the block at dusk no sooner than we got back and looked up we saw a very very large triangular shaped craft bering down on our exact position from as far as we could see on the horizon i estimated its size to be 50 to 75 ft thick and 300 yards tip to tip and 150 yards aft to rear i was moving on a level trajectory at an estimated speed of 800 mph at about 1500 ft .the object was cloaking itself against the stars of a clear night sky but we could see it as it covered the true stars during its passage . there was no dought to either one of us as to its emence size and speed but we plainly and clearly saw what we saw it was right outa star trek the size and speed without any sound at all in the slightest. on one other occasion we saw another object of exact same proportions traveling at about 5000 ft moving at aspeed that was much faster estimate:3000 mph we only had time too say these very words there gos another one it was humorus to us we both spoke the exact same words in song as we watched hahaha
